item.title: Docker Compose Python Eve Mongodb
item.description: PyCharm As a Python developer you are probably familiar with PyCharm, an amazing IDE from JetBrains. If you don’t know anything about it, have a look, you’ll probably not regret it :) Some of the steps in this article will make mention of PyCharm, however, it’s not required and you can still follow if you’re using another IDE. If you’re not using any IDE, well, god save your soul.
